about_the_game:
Have you ever felt the injustice of the world order, thinking that your nation should be at the top of the food chain? Or that some countries are undeservedly high in the global hierarchy and it would be nice to bring them down? If these feelings resonate with you, then you have come to the right place.

In our game, you can:
  • Develop the countries you care about.
  • Sink the ratings of disliked countries.
  • Become stronger and have a greater impact on the world order.

In our game:
  • A truly unlimited number of players are honestly and simultaneously on the same server.
  • The efforts of all players, potentially millions, are displayed in real-time.

Our project offers you a fair way to compete with all the players on the planet for the ranking of countries in the global leaderboard.

You will take part in a collective planetary battle and see the consequences of the collective actions of all players on the planet in real-time. You will realize your influence on countries and the world. How big or small that influence will be depends only on you.

You just need to choose a country and launch your Energy Plant to increase the Might of the country:

or to suppress it:


The more Force you have, the stronger your "Energy Plant":


This seemingly simple tool will shine with new colors in the conditions of real-time competition with players from all over the world. We confidently declare that we have achieved an unprecedented level of massiveness for multiplayer games!

  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 630

short_description: Here is a global multiplayer clicker/idle game where players from all over the world unite for a chance to restore global justice and make their country the greatest among all others. There has never been a game this global and massive!
